code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Header from'../components/Header';import Footer from'../components/Footer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Favorites=()=>{const[favorites,setFavorites]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const userEmail=localStorage.getItem('userEmail');axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/favorites/".concat(userEmail)).then(response=>{setFavorites(response.data);}).catch(err=>{console.error('Failed to fetch favorites',err);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-16",style:{minHeight:'100vh'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 text-white p-4 shadow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:"Your Favorite Products"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto mt-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:favorites.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 shadow rounded-lg bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name,className:"w-full h-64 object-cover rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:item.description})]})]},item.id))})})]})]});};export default Favorites;
